Full-Effect: The user slams its rugged body into the target to attack. This also damages the user quite a lot.

Name: Work Up
Short-Effect: Raises user's Attack and Special Attack.
Full-Effect: The user is roused, and its Attack and Sp. Atk stats are boosted.

Name: Worry Seed
Short-Effect: Changes the opponent's Ability to Insomnia.
Full-Effect: A seed that causes worry is planted on the target. It prevents sleep by making the target’s Ability Insomnia.

Name: Wrap
Short-Effect: Traps opponent, damaging them for 4-5 turns.
Full-Effect: A long body, vines, or the like are used to wrap and squeeze the target for four to five turns.

Name: Wring Out
Short-Effect: The higher the opponent's HP, the higher the damage.
Full-Effect: This move can’t be used. It’s recommended that this move is forgotten. Once forgotten, this move can’t be remembered.

Name: X-Scissor
Full-Effect: The user slashes at the target by crossing its scythes, claws, or the like as if they were a pair of scissors.

Name: Yawn
Short-Effect: Puts opponent to sleep in the next turn.
Full-Effect: The user lets loose a huge yawn that lulls the target into falling asleep on the next turn.

Name: Zap Cannon
Short-Effect: Paralyzes opponent.
Full-Effect: The user attacks by firing an electric blast like a cannon. This also leaves the target with paralysis.

Name: Zen Headbutt
Short-Effect: May cause flinching.
Full-Effect: The user focuses its willpower to its head and attacks the target. This may also make the target flinch.

Name: Zing Zap
Short-Effect: May cause flinching.
Full-Effect: The user crashes into the target, delivering a powerful electric shock. This may also make the target flinch.

Name: Zippy Zap
Short-Effect: Always results in a critical hit.
Full-Effect: This move can’t be used. It’s recommended that this move is forgotten. Once forgotten, this move can’t be remembered.
